When u said this it got me thinking, Works when i run YASU in windows xp compatibility mode.
yasu doesnt do any more good in xp either =/

it works great in win Xp .. you just have to install, run YASU, disable all emulations on daemon, Start copying Data3.cab from the image and quickly run ufo.exe (it not allways runs at first time - ofen I get a timeout error but usually when i press retry it works, if you have trouble you may try copying more files or using nero drivespeed aka limit virtualdrives speed)

Unfortunately .. as always with UFO series .. the game has lots of bugs, but :D I like this one the most, not counting the usual memory leaks it runs looks AND FEELS better than Aftershock ... so get newest drivers for everything I mean EVERYTING (GPU/Motherboard/Soundcard/Mouse :D/anything that needs drivers) and start playing :D and buying :D this one is really worth it

How to make the game work in vista=

Look on a torrent search engine for "UFO Afterlight" and find the patch called UFO Afterlight International 1.5.  Download it, then extract the those files into the directory where you installed UFO afterlight.  Run the patch.exe and wait for it to finish.

Then, look in the HATRED directory that was created by the patch that you just unzipped.  Take the ufo.exe file from there, and use it to replace the old ufo.exe.  Do NOT use the ufo.exe from the hatred dir on the CD, it doesnt work for Vista (at least for me)    Good luck!
